searchService.description: Search properties including ability to disable certain types of searches (NTS, FSA, SCALE, and/or LAT/LNG), modify default GeoSearch settings (filtering, sorting, etc.).

categories.description: Filter the search results based on the type of the geographical names. Allowed values can be found here (if using the Canadian GeoNames Search Service API): http://geogratis.gc.ca/services/geoname/en/codes/concise.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return per request. The Canadian GeoNames Search Service API has a 1000 search limit which will be used as an upper limit of results returned unless another service is being used with a higher limit. The default is 100 results.

disabledSearches.description: Disable specific types of searches including NTS, FSA, SCALE, or LAT/LNG

language.description: ISO 639-1 code indicating the language of strings in the schema file.

version.description: The schema version used to validate the configuration file. The schema should enumerate the list of versions accepted by this version of the viewer.
